inn1.comm: good length delivery outside the off stump, bit of away swing straightaway - Gibbs reads it well and leaves it through to the keeper

and gone! again the one that swings away late, this one was fuller in length and closer to the off stump line and Gibbs had no option but to play at it. Thick edge and Styris at second slip makes no mistake. What a start for the Kiwis
good delivery first up, slightly short and shaping away - Kallis leaves it through
first run on the board, worked away off the pads to the midwicket region - easy single
fuller length delivery outside the off stump, Smith gets behind the line and punches it away towards cover

good length and this one kept its line after hitting the deck, Smith was beaten all ends up and the pad was in the way - pleading appeal for lbw turned down. That was a good shot. End of a fantastic first over from Mills
starts off with a good length delivery, on and around the off stump line. Kallis gets a good stride in and presents the full face of the blade
full and on the stumps, Kallis punches it down to mid-on. Not a well timed shot and the ball came off the inner half of the bat.

full and wide outside the off stump, Kallis gets a good stride in, get right on top of the ball and drives it through the gap between point and gully. Again not timed to perfection but he managed to get enough bat on this one
better line and length, Kallis taps it away on the off side
driven down to mid-off
finally he middles one but the fielder at midwicket pulls off a brilliant diving stop saving a certain boundary. Gillespie not so impressive
line and length delivery outside the off stump, Smith has a poke at it and the ball goes through to the keeper
punched off the back-foot to the mid-off region, Mills is on target here
good length delivery outside the off stump, good looking drive but straight to the fielder at mid-off
beaten again! good length and this one kept its line, Smith pushes at it and the ball zips past the outside edge

that's the end of that! fuller length delivery outside the off stump, angling away a wee bit and Smith plays a loose drive outside the off stump. Once again the edge is loud and clear and Taylor at first slip dives across to his left and takes a superb low catch. Mills is on a roll here
short of a good length delivery outside the off stump and de Villiers is beaten outside the off stump. Another superb over comes to an end
touch outside the off stump and Kallis is on the front-foot defending
Gillespie strays on to middle and leg, Kallis stays back and works it away towards square leg for an easy single
short delivery outside the off stump. AB cuts hard, ball clips the bottom edge and goes towards the slip cordon, Styris at second slip  dives across to his right and cuts off a certain four
Gillespie makes it easier and AB takes full toll this time around. Another short and wide delivery outside the off stump, this time the timing is perfect and AB finds the gap between point and gully
better line and length, no shot offered
defended on the front-foot
worked away off the pads to the fine leg region for a brace
good length delivery outside the off stump, another good ball. Kallis walks across a bit and taps it away straight to the fielder at point
wide delivery outside the off stump and Kallis goes for the drive, ball clips the inner half of the bat and goes past the fielder at mid-off. Two more added to the total
defended outside the off stump
pitched up outside the off stump, in the slot but the drive finds the fielder at cover
slightly short but no width offered, Kallis stands tall on the back-foot and punches it straight to the fielder at point.
line and length delivery outside the off stump, no shot offered
again in the zone outside the off stump, bit of away swing and AB leaves it through to the keeper
similar line and length, AB is not in the mood
if you are wondering where the customary four-ball from Gillespie - here it is. Short and wide outside the off stump. AB leans back and cuts it through the narrow gap between point and fully
forced away on the off side
short of a good length delivery outside the off stump, no shot offered
short of a good length delivery, close to the off stump line and kallis defends it away off the back-foot
wide and swinging away further, Kallis shoulders arms
this one cut back in, well bowled Mills. Kallis being Kallis is ready for it, quickly goes back and defends it down on the leg side
another good delivery, on the middle and off stump line and this one kept its line after hitting the deck. Kallis gets right behind the line and once again plays it down on the leg side
full and outside the off stump, the sucker-ball as they call it but we all know what Kallis is not

short of a good length delivery outside the off stump, Kallis goes for the pull but the ball came in much slower than expected, the shot is checked at the last moment and is safely played away towards midwicket. Well played in the end
left alone outside the off stump
short outside the off stump, Kallis tries to cut it in the air behind point but fails to make contact
good length delivery outside the off stump, Kallis goes for the square drive and the ball runs away off the outer half of the bat
punched away off the back-foot to the cover region

Gillespie redeems himself with a twister! good length delivery on the middle and off stump line, this one kept its line after hitting the deck leaving AB clueless, hardly any foot movement from the batsman and the ball zips past the outside edge and crashes into the woodwork. South Africa in a spot of bother here
down the leg side and that's a wide
short of a good length delivery, played away towards midwicket. Not a convincing shot that
good length delivery outside the off stump, Kallis stays back and punches it away towards cover
worked away off the pads, gets it into the gap between mid-on and midwicket, early call and a quick single is added to the total
short delivery outside the off stump, drifting in a bit. Duminy reads it well and shoulders arms
good length delivery outside the off stump, Duminy thinks about it but at the last moment pulls away from the drive
full and in the slot outside the off stump, Duminy drives well and gets it past the fielder at mid-off, no point chasing that
short delivery, angled across the left-hander, Duminy stays back and drives it towards cover
wide delivery outside the off stump, Kallis pays safe by leaving it through to the keeper
on the middle and off stump line, Kallis gets right behind the line and punches it down to mid-on, no room for a single there
driven hard and straight to the fielder at point
again the man at point has some work to do
bit of extra bounce, Kallis gets right on top of the bounce and fends it down
swung away towards midwicket but not timed well enough to beat the fielder there. Maiden over from Gillespie
short of a good length delivery, close to the off stump line and Duminy is made to defend
good length delivery outside the off stump, again no width offered. Duminy leaves it through
full and wide outside the off stump, had 'four' written all over it and Duminy unleashes a cracking cover drive that beats the fielder inside the circle - classy shot
worked away off the pads, no single there
full and drifting down the leg side. 'I need a break skipper' delivery. Duminy misses out on easy runs but the umpire plays his part
left alone outside the off stump
driven down to mid-off,  5 runs off the first over of the second power play.
starts off with a decent delivery outside the off stump, Kallis leaves it through to the keeper
comes down the track and drives towards point, diving stop saves runs - the pressure is starting to show
slightly short and this one jagged back in after pitching outside the off stump, Kallis is cramped for room but somehow manages to pays it down on the leg side. Welldone
punched down to mid-on, the fielder is too deep and they stroll across for a well judged single
worked away on the leg side and they scamper through for a single, direct hit would have been interesting
inside edge onto the pad
Duminy continues to impress. fuller length delivery outside the off stump and thats driven straight down the track to the long-off fence
taps it down on the leg side and they scamper through for a single
inside edge and the ball rolls away towards square leg

good length delivery outside the off stump, angled across the left-hander. Duminy gets a good stride in and drives it through the gap between the cover fielder. Long case and a desperate dive from Taylor saves one run
turned away towards square leg
guided to third man, yet another easy single added to the total.
bowls from round the wicket, bangs it in slightly short and gets it to come into the left hander, defended
offers a bit of width outside off and Duminy opens the face of the bat and glides to third man
short and wide outside off, the invitation was there was the cut but Kallis fails to capitalise on it as he ends up slashing straight to cover
fullish outside off, he shuffles across his stumps and tries to clip past midwicket but finds the fielder
drifts towards the pads, slower ball, turned towards fine leg
oho...what was Kallis thinking? wide outside off, Kallis goes for the cut but just can't connect
pushed in fast and flat, turned to midwicket
gets it to turn here, Duminy gets forward, covers the line and places the ball to point
good stuff again from Patel, bowls around the off stump and JP pushes to the bowler
fullish outside off, gets a good stride forward and pushes to cover
Patel strays off line for the first time, drifts on the pads, worked to fine leg
pushed in flat and fast, almost a yorker length, Kallis pushes back to the bowler
lands on a good length outside off, Duminy goes back and pushes to the covers
Oram sticks to the line outside off, Duminy pushes with soft hands to cover again
quick single taken, Duminy plays with soft hands to the on side and sets off, Kallis makes his ground but is in a bit of discomfort, must have pulled a muscle
Kallis brings up South Africa's fifty with a glide to third man
full on middle and leg, pushed firmly back to the bowler
fullish out side off again, pushed to mid-off
tossed on middle and leg, tries to work it to the on side but the ball clips his pads
tossed outside off, gets a stride across and works it to midwicket
appeal... comes in with the angle and strikes him a little high, may have missed the line of off stump as well
gets across his stumps and works it to the on side
pushed in flat and fast outside off, opens the face and glides to third man

Duminy falls for the trap... flighted outside off, Duminy gets down and goes for the slog sweep. What he didn't realise was that he had a fielder at deep midwicket for that stroke. The elevation wasn't enough to clear the rope and Vincent took it easily
good length delivery on the stumps and Boucher defends it back to the bowler
good length delivery on the pads, Boucher waits for the ball and nudges it down to fine leg for an easy single
short of a good length delivery outside the off stump, Kallis stands tall and taps it away well in front of point
bit of shape away, Boucher moves back and across and drives it down to mid-off
good length delivery outside the off stump, bit of extra bounce and Boucher leaves it through to the keeper. Still something in the track for the pacers
another one hits the deck and jumps up, Boucher pushes forward to defend and the ball rolls away off the shoulder of the bat
tossed up outside the off stump, defended watchfully
drifting down the leg side, Boucher fails to make contact and the ball rolls away off the pad
driven off the back-foot, straight back to the bowler
defended to off side
arm ball, the one that skids in - Boucher fails to make contact and the ball crashes into the pad. Missing leg for sure
driven off the front foot, no room for a single there
good length delivery, close to the off stump, defended watchfully
short delivery, pulled to midwicket, straight to the fielder there
forced away off the back-foot to short cover
goes for the driven and finds the fielder at mid off
short delivery outside the off stump, Kallis goes for the cut but fails to get it away. Once again the ball coming off the outer half of the bat
second maiden in a row! good length delivery outside the off stump, Kallis leans back and taps it back to the bowler
drifting down the leg side and that's a wide
worked away off the pads to the midwicket region
tossed up outside the off stump, defended on the front-foot
flighted delivery, Kallis manages to get it wide of the fielder at cover -  finally a run!
excellent delivery outside the off stump, Boucher gets well forward and defends it watchfully
tossed up, punched away towards cover point
turned away off the pads to the midwicket region
short rising delivery outside the off stump, no shot offered
turned away off the back-foot to short midwicket.
wide delivery outside the off stump, Kallis comes down the track and tries to cut but gets nowhere near the line
defended watchfully
finally! Kallis comes down the track, picks one from outside the off stump and pulls it away to the midwicket fence.

Kallis goes! another short of a good length delivery outside the off stump, once again Kallis comes down the track, this time he attempts to cut over point and the ball finds Taylor at deep backward point. South Africa in deep trouble here.
good length delivery outside the off stump, defended
tossed up on the stumps, defended back to the bowler
turned away off the pads to the square leg region
turning away and Boucher is beaten outside the off stump
forced away towards point, no room for a single there
worked away against the spin to the midwicket region
pushed away towards cover and they scamper through for a single. Tap and run
in the channel outside the off stump, no shot offered
short of a good length delivery, Boucher stays back and drives it down to mid-on. Patel moves in quickly and has a go at the bowler's end stumps. Had he hit, Boucher would have been history
good length delivery on the middle and off stump line, defended back to the bowler
short of a good length delivery outside the off stump, Pollock moves across a bit, reads it well and shoulders arms
another in-the-channel short of a good length delivery, Pollock stands tall and defends it back down the track
driven down to mid-off, tame little shot
beaten first ball - pitched short outside the off stump and this one spun in sharply, Boucher goes back and across and gets hit on the pad
worked away with the spin to the leg side
forced away towards midwicket and they taken on the fielder coming in from the edge of the circle
goes for the cut and gets beaten outside the off stump, this one did not spin much
bit wide outside the off stump, cut away off the back-foot to the point region
punched off the back-foot to the mid-on region
good length delivery outside the off stump, defended
worked away well in front of square leg for a single, that's as good as it gets
in the channel outside the off stump, Pollock goes back and across and defends it down tamely
another line and length delivery outside the off stump, Pollock on the back-foot defending
worked away off the back-foot to silly mid-on, quick single taken
defended down the track and Oram takes it on the bounce
worked away towards midwicket, diving stop there saves runs
tossed up on the middle and off stump line, turning in - Pollock, looking to work it away on the leg side ends up with an inside edge on to his pad
defended down behind the stumps on the leg side, quick single take
worked away with the spin and the ball finds the fielder at midwicket
flat delivery outside the off stump, Boucher gets a good stride in and works it away well wide of Vincent at midwicket.
in the channel outside the off stump, defended on the back-foot. Just two runs of the over and the Kiwi strangle hold continues.
slightly short, Boucher goes on the back-foot and punches it down to mid-on
tossed up outside the off stump, defended on the front-foot
cut away of the back-foot to the point region
flat delivery on the stumps and the drive goes to the fielder at cover
forced away into the gap between cover and point. Single taken
again pushed away on the off side and they scamper through for a dangerous single. The under arm throw from cover is off target and Pollock makes it across safely
worked away off the pads to deep square leg, once again there a bit of mix up, this time going for the second run and in the end they wisely decide not to for it
tossed up and turning in, ball clips the pad and lobs up on the leg side
turned away on the leg side, Pollock was looking for the single but Boucher sends him back
flat delivery outside the off stump, bit of turn. Pollock pushes forward and defends it down
turned away through square leg for an easy single, no confusion this time around - now that's a change
turning in from wide outside the off stump, Boucher goes back, wait for the ball to turn and runs it off the face of the bat to the third man region, excellent shot
short ball, Pollock goes for the pull but ends up with an inside edge down to short fine leg
tossed up outside the off stump and Pollock drives it down to long-off for a single
again driven down the ground to long-off for a single
quicker delivery on the pads, driven down to long-on for a change
flat delivery outside the off stump, pushed away towards point
short ball and Boucher punches off the back-foot, ball clips the inner half of the bat and rolls down to silly mid-on. Another over flies by
short and turning in, Pollock stays back and works it away towards square leg
worked away with the turn to the short fine leg region. Throw at the bowler's end fails to hit the target and Pollocks makes it across
cut away hard but the fielder at point cuts it off
worked away off the back-foot to the backward square leg region
turned away well in front of square leg - easy single added
fulltoss on the stumps, Boucher gives himself room and drives inside out. Diving stop by Vettori at mid-off cuts off the boundary
worked away off the back-foot to deep midwicket
arm ball, Boucher picks it up early and punches it back to the bowler
slower through the air this time and Boucher taps it away watchfully
forced away towards point
tossed up on the stumps, defended on the front-foot
driven down to long-on, easy single to end the over
short and wide outside off, Pollock reads the length early, shifts his weight on the backfoot and bangs it past extra cover
pushed in faster on off and middle, pushed to the on side
pushes it quickly again and Pollock drives through the line to long-on
gives it a bit more air and cuts down the pace, tries to work it past square leg but finds the fielder
short and wide outside off, looked like a boundary ball, Pollock sizes up to cut but mistimes it by chopping the ball down to the ground
driven through the line to long-on
poor start... Gillespie feeds Pollock with a gift outside off, Pollock stretches out, scoops the ball over backward point and Oram messes up his dive at the boundary
another one... outside off, in the slot and Pollock gets his bat down with an angle and slashes it over backward point. This was much squarer
that's a hattrick of fours.... Gillespie loses his line again by overpitching on middle and leg, Pollock shows the 'V' and drives straight
Gillespie aims for the yorker length and keeps Pollock quiet as he digs it back to him
fullish outside off and drilled past point
fullish on middle and leg, dug out to mid-on
full and wide outside off, driven past extra cover
tossed on middle and leg, pushed to the on side
tossed on middle and leg, pushed to the on side
appeal.... flighted outside off, Pollock goes for a square drive past point, there were a couple of noises and McCullum was mighty confident. The umpire said no
another appeal..this time Patel slides down leg, Pollock tries to glide it fine. McCullum thinks he got a thin edge but the umpire wasnt convinced again
down leg again and glanced to fine leg
good length fired in on middle and off, Pollock covers the line and defends
good length sliding towards the pads this time, Pollock works it off his wrists to deep midwicket
pushed with soft hands towards cover, Boucher sets off to rotate the strike, Pollock sends him back and Boucher scampers to his end
good length outside off, pushed to the off side
slower ball, the offcutter, drifts on the pads, worked to deep midwicket
full outside off, Pollock closes the face of the bat too early and plays an inside out stroke along the ground to mid-off
starts off with a delivery drifting down the leg side, Boucher moves across a bit and works it down to fine leg
fuller length delivery on the stumps, Pollock stays back and drives it down to long-off
good length delivery outside the off stump, driven well wide of the fielder at cover
forced away on the off side
full and on the stumps, driven down to long-on
off cutter, Boucher leans and tries to cut but fails to time his shot and the ball rolls away off the edge
angled in with the arm and Pollock taps it away on the leg side for a single
flat and on the middle and off stump line, Boucher pushes forward to defend and gets hit on the pad. McCullum goes up for the lbw but the umpire is not interested
driven away towards cover and a diving stop saves runs
worked away on the leg side
defended outside the of stump
quicker delivery, watchfully played
pulled away to fine leg for a brace
defended outside the off stump
driven well wide of the fielder at cover
worked away towards midwicket and Boucher is back on strike
slightly short and this time Boucher pulls it away to the backward square leg fence. This is turning out to be a good over for South Africa
defended back to the bowler, eight runs off the over
driven down to long-on for an easy single
forced away off the back-foot to the point region
short delivery outside the off stump, Pollock quickly gets into position and cuts it away through cover point
forced away through the leg side for an easy single
tossed up outside the off stump, defended on the front-foot and they scamper through for a single
punched off the back-foot to the midwicket region, another decent over for South Africa comes to an end

starts off with a wayward delivery down the leg side. Boucher waits for the ball and works it away fine , there is no fine leg in place and the ball races away to the fence. Good start to the over for South Africa -  they need few big over to turn this into a fighting total
good length delivery outside the off stump and Boucher runs it down to third man for a single
short of a good length delivery outside the off stump, no real width offered there but Pollock rocks back and cuts it away straight to the man at deep backward point
opens the face of the bat and runs it down to short fine leg, the fielder moves across quickly and cuts off the single
short ball and this one came slow of the track, Boucher is bit early into the pull, beaten by the lack of pace there, ball takes the inside edge and crashes into the pad
another short ball and Boucher pulls it away in front of square leg for a single
fuller length delivery outside the off stump, Boucher drives inside out and gets it well wide of the fielder at mid-off.
tossed up on the off stump line, Boucher gets forward and defends it down
short ball and that's pulled away straight to the fielder at deep midwicket
cut away off the back-foot to the cover region, quick single taken
flat and on the pads, Boucher comes down the track and turns it away through square leg
pushed back to the bowler
good length delivery outside the off stump, not there for the cut but Boucher goes for it and gets beaten by a long way. Good take by McCullum who is standing up to Oram
slightly short and pulled away to deep backward square leg, diving stop cuts off the boundary
punched down long-on for a single
short and wide outside the off stump, Pollock cuts and cuts well. Another good diving stop at gully saves runs
punched straight to the fielder at backward point, just three of this over so far.
pitched up on the pads and Boucher driven it wide of the fielder at deep midwicket. End of a fine spell from the big man
flat delivery outside the off stump and Boucher taps it away towards cover, bit of a mix up going for the single and in the end they decide not to go for it
Boucher comes down the track and Vettori pulls it back a bit. Boucher goes through with the shot anyway and ends up hitting it straight down the throat of Patel at long-on. That's a crucial bowl
cut away off the back-foot to the fielder at point
driven square on the off side for an easy single
flat delivery on the stumps, worked away towards square leg
punched off the back-foot, Vettori moves across and fields - Another excellent spell comes to an end.
full outside the off stump, driven down to long-off for a single
fuller and quicker, driven straight to the fielder at cover
drifting down the leg side and Morkel nudges it down to fine leg, again just a single
another fuller length delivery outside the off stump, close to 95 kph and Pollocks finds the fielder at cover
full and on the stumps, worked away nicely on the leg side for a single
bowled from round the stumps, full and on the middle and off stump line. Morkel defends it on the back-foot. Good over from Patel comes to and end.
full and on the pads, driven straight to the man at midwicket - quick single taken
short of a good length delivery, bowled from round the stumps and coming in with the angle. Morkel stands tall on the back-foot and punches it wide of the fielder at cover
BEAMER! full and this one was at chest height, Pollock went through with the pull and the ball ballooned off the top edge. Styris at fine leg made no mistake but...
drifting down the leg side and Morkel clips it down to the fine leg fence
beaten outside the off stump, good comeback delivery
slower delivery on the stumps, this one was full and Morkel ends up punching it back to the bowler

Gillespie has the fine say! good length delivery, bowled from round the stumps and this one went straight on. Morkel goes for the pull, but missed the target by miles. Once again the woodwork is disturbed and South Africa are seven down
yorker length and Pollock digs it down to long-off
sharp turn and Botha fails to make contact, ball clips the pad and pops up
worked away towards midwicket, midwicket fielder moves across quickly and cuts off the single
low fulltoss on the stumps and Botha clips it away through midwicket, lot of bottom hand in that shot. Pollock calls for the third and makes it across safely.
full and on the stumps, Pollock leans forward and drives it down to long-on, just a single
take that! tossed up on the middle and off stump line, Botha quickly gets into position and reverse sweeps it down to the fine leg fence, more of a reverse smash than a sweep
yorked! perfect yorker, bowled from wide of the crease and the ball shaped in a bit, Pollock plays all over it and the ball crashes into middle and leg.
short of a good length delivery outside the off stump and Nel tamely plays it away behind point

short rising delivery, bowled from wide of the crease and coming in with the angle. Nel stands tall on the back-foot and defends it down on the off side. Botha calls for the single and they scamper through
short delivery, again coming in with the angle. No room offered and Botha plays it down behind the stumps on the off side
short rising delivery outside the off stump, Nel has a poke at it and the ball goes through to the keeper. Gillespie seems to have learned his lesson.
punched down to long-off
good length delivery outside the off stump and Nel drives it to deep cover, his favourite area. End of a top over
four more! short and wide outside the off stump and Nel cuts it in the air and well wide of the fielder at gully. 10 runs of the first two balls

take that! Nel is on a roll here. Good length delivery and Nel just muscles it away well in front of square leg. 14 of the first three balls and suddenly 200 is not a dream anymore. Mills under pressure here
worked away to wide long-on for a single
good length delivery on the pad and Botha clips it away in the air to deep midwicket, Vincent comes in quickly from the edge of the boundary, dives forward and takes a superb catch.
worked away on the leg side and they go for the single, Styris fails to hit the stumps at the bowler's end and Nel makes it across. The single will keep him on strike
fuller length delivery on the middle and leg stump line, excellent length and Nel only manages to punch it down to long-on
good length delivery outside the off stump and Langeveldt gets it wide of the fielder at cover, single brings Nel back on strike
excellent yorker and Nel digs it away on the off side, good over so far from Gillespie
short delivery outside the off stump, cut away off the back-foot to the deep backward point
200 up! yorker goes wrong and ends up as a low fulltoss, Nel swings across and the ball races away off the edge to the third man fence. This is Nel's best ODI innings so far

Nel finishes the innings with a brutal six! good length delivery, cutting in from outside the off stump. Nel makes room and swigs hard, this time the ball hits the middle of the bat and flies over the wide long-on fence.

inn2.comm: bit of swing outside the off stump, no shot offered
short of a good length delivery, again shaping away from the right-hander, Vincent leaves it through to the keeper
good length delivery outside the off stump, watchfully played towards cover point
short delivery outside the off stump, Vincent leans back and cuts it away well wide of the fielder at point. Third man hurtles across in the deep and cuts off the boundary, off they go
good length delivery, in the channel outside the off stump and swinging away late. Vincent reads it well and leaves it through to the keeper

mix-up! good length delivery on the stumps, Vincent taps it down on the leg side and calls for the single, it's a big mix-up but he makes it across eventually. A wide throw from the the fielder coming in from the edge of the circle helped
good length delivery outside the off stump, cutting in a touch. Vincent reads it well and shoulders arms

short of a good length delivery, in the channel outside the off stump and Vincent goes for the drive, ball clips the shoulder of the bat and flies down to third man, Duminy moves across quickly in the deep and a desperate dive cuts off a certain boundary
another edge and this time it's a boundary! fuller length delivery outside the off stump. Vincent drives hard and the edge files over the slip cordon

RUN OUT! Vincent finally manages to run himself out. Good length delivery on the stumps, Vincent taps it down on the leg side and takes off for a single that was never there. McCullum rightly sends him back, Nel moves across quickly, the pick up is perfect and he hits the stumps direct.
left alone outside off stump
short of a good length delivery outside the off stump, How leaves it through to the keeper
short of a good length delivery outside the off stump, McCullum moves back and across, stands tall and drives it straight to the fielder at mid-off
short and wide outside the off stump, McCullum goes for the cut and is beaten by the lack of bounce there
in the channel outside the off stump and this one kicked up a bit after hitting the deck. McCullum moves across, covers the line and leaves it through to the keeper
goos length delivery on the middle and off stump line, McCullum moves right across the stumps and works it away towards square leg. Had he missed that would have been plumb
another tight delivery, punched down to mid-on
edged down to third man, just a single
full and on the middle and off stumps line, How goes across a bit, gets right behind the line and clips it away through the gap between mid-on and midwicket. Top shot
good length delivery, driven away towards cover
worked away off the back-foot to the square leg region
short ball, the one that comes in with the arm. How goes for the pull, bit early into the shot and the ball goes up in the air towards mid-off
defended down on the leg side
good length delivery outside the off stump, no shot offered

short of a good length delivery, McCullum goes back and across and punches it into the gap between the cover fielders. Gibbs moves across and fires in the throw at the striker's end and suddenly what seemed as an easy run became a dangerous attempt. It would have been interesting, had Gibbs hit
good length delivery outside the off stump, pushed away on the off side
defended on the back-foot
in the channel outside the off stump, How not interested
again the line and length is perfect. How once again shoulders arms
bit fuller on this occasion - How keeps his nerves and leaves it through to the keeper
wow! full and outside the stumps, in the slot and McCullum just lofted it straight back over the bowlers head. Good clean hit
cut away towards point, diving stop saves runs
take that! short and wide outside the off stump, McCullum just leans back and whips it over point. Once again the shot is timed well. Nel under pressure here
good length delivery on the middle and off stump line, better line and length. McCullum gets behind the line and defends it down on the leg side
short delivery down the leg side, McCullum has a swing at it but fails to make contact
worked away into the gap on the leg side, quick single added
streaky bottom edge and the ball races away to the fine leg fence. Not shot enough to pull but How went for it. End of an expensive over from Nel
good length delivery on the middle and off stump line, cutting in - McCullum gets behind the line and punches it down to mid-on for a quick single
good length delivery outside the off stump, no shot offered
defended back to the bowler
good length delivery on the stumps, worked away on the leg side for an easy single
punched down to mid-on and they scamper through for a single
edged and through! another good delivery from the veteran - How had to play at it and the edge just flew past the diving fielder at second slip
short of a good length delivery, McCullum punches it down to mid-on, the fielder is bit deep and they scamper through
good length, drifting down the leg side and the ball clips the side of the pad on its way to the keeper
short of a good length delivery on the middle and off stump line, How stands tall on the back-foot and presents the full face of the bat
punched away authoritatively to the cover region
full and on the pads, bad line and length and How just clips it away through midwicket for an easy boundary
short delivery outside the off stump, this one kept a bit low and How is beaten, going for the pull
slightly short and McCullum pulls it away nicely but finds the fielder in the deep.
good length delivery outside the off stump, defended on the front-foot
in the channel outside the off stump, defended back to the bowler
good length delivery outside the off stump, no shot offered
once again Pollock hits the coin outside the off stump and How leaves it through to the keeper
closer to the off stump line, defended on the front-foot
short of a good length delivery, McCullum pulls hard and ends up with an outside edge on to his shoulder
good length delivery outside the off stump, McCullum shpaes up for the cut but decides against it at the last moment
punched off the back-foot to the cover region, slight misfield there but no damage done
good length delivery, driven off the back-foot and straight to the fielder at point
looks to work it away on the leg side but fails to make contact
smoked towards cover, half stop saves a certain boundary
risky run...McCullum plays a gentle forwards defensive push to mid-on and sets off, the fielder underarms the throw at the stumps but he just makes his ground
good length outside off, pushed to mid-off
good length outside off again, How shows the full face of the bat and defends
maintains the same length though shifts the line to middle and leg, How gets back and defends to mid-on
left alone outside off, Pollock gets a lot of bounce and carry this time
played with soft hands close to the pads, How sets off and Pollock appeals for a leg before, stops the appeal, runs across to gather the ball to afect a run-out but the batsmen were safe
inside out shot to the off side, How sets off quickly de Villiers darts from point, gathers the ball and hurls it at the non-striker's end. How obstructs the stumps and takes a blow on the foot
short and wide outside off, McCullum sizes up  for the upper cut and slashes over the slips
short and wide out side off, McCullum slaps that over point and the ball just falls short of the rope near third man
slower ball outside off, goes for the drive but misses
pushed to the off side, an the throw hits the stumps, the batsman was home, though the decision was referred, an overthrow results in an extra run
pushed to the on side for a single
good length on middle and leg, turned to the on side

Dropped.... Gibbs could have caught that in his sleep... McCullum gets a stride forward, plays close to the pad, the ball gets the pad first, then bat and lobs to Gibbs at cover. Pollock appeals for a leg before and we can say at best that Gibbs may have been distracted by the appeal. Still though, he should have taken it
left alone, McCullum walks across his stumps and lets it go watchfully
and again.... pitches outside off, walks across his stumps and lets it go
defended to the off side
yorker, gets an inside edge onto his boot, he sets off and the bowler tries to kick the ball on the stumps to affect a run-out
good length outside off, pushed to the off side
full and straight, in the slot to drive, he drives back to Langeveldt firmly
streaky... gets a big stride forward, McCullum just checks his stroke and the ball balloons over the bowler and just wide of mid-off
McCullum lets it go outside off, he walks across and leaves it
full and on the stumps, punched down to mid-on
good length delivery on the middle and off stump line, defended on the back-foot and the ball rolls away towards midwicket
short and drifting down the leg side and How whips it away to the fine leg fence. That was a horrible delivery to bowl with the fine leg up in the circle
slightly short and this time McCullum pulls it away towards midwicket and the ball sneaks past Kallis inside the circle
driven hard but straight to the fielder at mid-off, good shot for no runs
slower delivery to end the over and How is beaten outside the off stump
excellent bouncer. McCullum did well to duck under it
clipped away off the pads and McCullum gets it past Smith at mid-on. Long chase and a sliding effort saves one run
good length delivery outside the off stump, driven straight to the fielder at cover
another good looking drive, once again the ball finds the fielder at cover
shot of a good length delivery, in the channel outside the off stump and cutting in. How gets forward and defends it down on the off side
chance of pace and How is beaten outside the off stump
good length delivery outside the off stump, defended on the front-foot
good length delivery on the middle and off stump line, coming in with the angle. McCullum gets a good stride in and punches it down to mid-on for a quick single
slower delivery outside the off stump, defended down on the off side and How takes on AB at point and just makes it across.
short and pulled away behind square on the leg side, excellent diving effort from Nel in the deep saves two runs
inside edge on to the pad and the ball rolls past the off stump. Close call
short and coming in with the angle, McCullum stands tall and defends it down

Full and in the slot outside the off stump, was the slower delivery and How picked it up early. Free flowing drive and the fielder at mid-off had no chance of cutting it off. That is the over taken care of if you go by the required run rate
better line and length, defended watchfully
drifting down the leg side, bit of frustration creeping in
short of a good length delivery, width offered and How goes for the cut. Ball clips the top edge and flies down to the third man fence. This is turning out to be a good over for the Black Caps
defended watchfully
another short ball, pulled away to square leg - just a single on this occasion
short delivery on the off stump line, McCullum leans back and cuts it past the diving fielder at point
on the pads and clipped away to deep backward square leg for a single
good length delivery, no width offered and How defends it away towards cover.
slower delivery, How stays back and forces it away straight to the fielder at point

short of a good length delivery, cutting in from outside the off stump. How goes for the pull and the ball zips pas the outside the off stump. Morkel thinks there was bit of bat involved but he is alone

forced away towards cover and they scamper through for a single. Gibbs hits the stumps direct at the striker's end and they go upstairs. Replays suggest that McCullum was comfortably in by the time the ball touched the woodwork
shot! in the slot outside the off stump and McCullum just smokes it through extra cover for a powerful boundary. Didn't bother to keep it down and he cleared the in-field comfortably
short ball and pulled away well in front of square leg
offcutter, watchfully played away towards cover
another short delivery, this one was there to be hit and McCullum had no problem in pulling it away to the deep backward square leg fence. Desperate dive in the deep ends in vain.
left alone outside the off stump
defended away towards midwicket
bouncer, cutting in from wide outside the off stump and McCullum ducks under it
full and on the stumps, driven straight back down the track
tossed up outside the off stump, defended leaning well forward
drifting down the leg side, How fails to get bat on ball
on middle and off and turning in, How plays it with the turn to the short fine leg region
punched back down the track, Botha moves across quickly and cuts off the single
tossed up outside the off stump, defended back to the bowler
turned away with the spin to deep backward square leg, easy two to end the over
good length delivery outside the off stump, McCullum skips forward and punches it well wide of Smith at mid-off
pitched up on the stumps and McCullum drills it straight back to the bowler
fifty! short delivery outside the off stump, McCullum makes room and hammers it through cover point.
short of a good length delivery outside the off stump, McCullum swings hard but fails to make contact
no stopping that! full and wide outside the off stump, McCullum lines it up and hammers it straight back down the track to the long-off fence. 100 partnership comes up - 99 more needed
short ball, another swing and a miss outside the off stump
driven down to long-on for an easy single
tossed up outside the off stump, defended stretching well forward
worked away on the leg side
flat delivery, McCullum comes down the track and drives it down to long-on
on the off stump line, defended with a straight bat
full and wide outside the off stump, How waits for it and steer-drives it past the fielder at short third man. Long chase ends in vain and its looking all too easy at the moment for the visitors
good length delivery, the offcutter and this one stopped a bit - McCullum pushes forward and the ball goes straight to Smith at one bounce
four more! good length delivery on the stumps, McCullum pushes forward and lofts it down to the vacant long-off fence
short ball, pulled away to deep midwicket
Nel continues to struggle! pushes this one up and McCullum gleefully hammers it down to the long-off fence. As easy as it gets. I think it is safe to assume that this game is over as a contest
short and drifting down the leg side, more problems
good length delivery, driven through cover point for a brace
short and wide outside the off stump, McCullum leans back and cuts it away in the air to deep point. Once bounce and straight to Pollock in the deep. Another good over comes to and end
forced away on the off side
flat delivery, McCullum comes down the track, takes it on the full and punches it down to long-on for an easy single
How too gets one down to long-on
full and on the stumps, probably the wrong'un. McCullum pushes forward to defend and ends up with a leading edge towards cover
full and driven straight back to the bowler
slower delivery outside the off stump, McCullum pushes forward and gets beaten outside the off stump
good length delivery outside the off stump and How drives it away to sweeper cover. That's his fifty
full and on the pads, driven away well wide of the fielder at midwicket
good length delivery outside the off stump, driven hard but straight to the fielder at cover
full and wide outside the off stump, How leans forward, gets close to then line and drives it past the fielder at mid-off. There is no protection in the deep
forced away just wide of the fielder at point and they scamper through for a single.
short ball on the pads, clipped away to deep square leg
flat outside the off stump, McCullum comes down the track and defends it away towards cover
pulled away to deep midwicket
tossed up outside the off stump, driven behind point
forced away well in front of point
flat delivery outside the off stump, turning in. How gets a good stride in and defends watchfully
forced away straight to the fielder at cover
defended down in front of point and they rush through for a single
pitched up and coming in with the angle, How pushes forward and drives it back to the bowler on the bounce
full and drifting on to the pads, How leans forward and drives it into the gap between mid-on and midwicket - no stopping that
defended down on the off side, another quick single added to the total
short outside the off stump, McCullum leans cuts hard but fails to make contact
full and drifting in, bit of inside edge on to the pad
flighted outside off, comes in with the turn, tucked to midwicket
bowls short of a length, comes on straight, pushed to long-on
flighted outside off, big turn into the right hander, shuffles across the stumps and turns it to fine leg
outside off and pushed to the off side
outside off and pushed to long-off
defended back to the bowler
slower ball, outside the off stump, pushed to the off side, an attempted direct hit at the non strikers misses the stumps
good length outside off, pushed to the off side
another slower ball, McCullum goes for the hoick across the line and misses
brings up the 150 partnership by smoking a short of a length ball across the line over midwicket...any takers? Nobody
outside off and glided past point
pushed outside off and played to long-on

driven away to deep cover and they taken on Steyn in the deep by going for the second run. It's a nice little throw that comes in at the bowler's end and Both flicks the stumps quickly. McCullum gets the dive in but replays show that he was just short of his crease. The third umpire is woken up and the RED light flashes
defended outside the off stump
punched away on the off side
driven down to long-on for an easy single
full and on the stumps, defended watchfully
on the middle and leg stump line, worked away well in front of square leg for an easy single, that brings the new man Styris to the fore
good length delivery outside the off stump, forced away towards point
good length delivery outside the off stump, driven away into the gap between the cover fielders. 44 needed now
short of a good length delivery, was the slower delivery and How makes no contact, going for the pull and the ball crashes into his stomach
pitched up outside the off stump, driven hard but straight to the fielder at mid-off
shot! full and on the pads, How leans forward, gets right on top of the bounce and flicks it over midwicket. Fielder in the deep had no chance of cutting it off
Styris! flat delivery outside the off stump, Styris dances down the track and lofts it over the long-on fence
fuller length delivery, Styris once again comes down the track and this time he drives it all along the ground to the wide long-off region
forced away towards point
full and on the pads, driven straight to the fielder at mid-on
more runs! he is in a hurry - that's for sure. With the field up , Sytris comes down the track and lofts a harmless delivery to the long-on fence. Just 28 more needed now
full and on the stumps, punched down to mid-on
fuller length delivery on the stumps and How finds the fielder at mid-on
beaten outside the off stump, nothing much in the delivery there, just How going too hard at it
good length delivery outside the off stump, driven down to mid-off
cut away towards extra cover, not a well time shot
edged down to third man, easy single added to the total
crack! full and in the slot outside the off stump, Styris just lines it up and drills it right through the gap between mid-off and cover. Just 23 more required now - all but over
drifts on to the pads and How clips it down to long leg, hard to rush for the second but he makes it across comfortably in the end
good length delivery on the middle and off stump line. Defended on the back-foot
short of a good length delivery outside the off stump, How stays back and forces it away towards cover
good length delivery on the middle and off stump line, How moves across a bit and works it away towards midwicket
pitched up and driven straight back to the bowler
slow leg cutter to end the over - defended watchfully
pitched up, was in the slot but Styris finds the cover fielder on the bounce
short of a good length delivery, punched off the back-foot to deep point
How falls! Good length delivery, and this one jagged back in sharply - How was committed to the drive and ball crashed into the pad - that was plumb and the dreaded finger went up straightaway
short of a good length delivery and Taylor is beaten first ball
worked away towards square leg for an easy single and he is off the mark
good length delivery and Styris drives it to sweeper cover for a single. End of a successful over
punched off the back-foot to the point region
short of a good length delivery outside the off stump, not much room offered there - Styris stands tall and jabs it down to third man for a single
turned away through square leg, the first run is taken quickly and they make it back comfortably for the second
wow! bit of width offered outside the off stump and Taylor just hammers it through cover point - there is no protection in the deep
good length delivery on the middle and off stump line, much better line and length. Taylor gets a good stride in and defends it down watchfully
four more! short rising delivery on the off stump line, Taylor gets right on top of the bounce and pulls it away to the wide long-on fence. 7 more runs and we are through
worked away straight to the fielder at short midwicket
wayward delivery down the leg side, Styris misses out but the ball brushes the pad and goes wide of the keeper
turned away off the back-foot to the midwicket region, easy single
good length delivery, Styris makes room and thuds it in the air towards mid-off. Half stop there cuts off the boundary
punched away off the back-foot to backward point
edged away towards point, AB moves across quickly and cuts off the single
tossed up and punched away towards cover, diving stop prolongs the inevitable
driven wide of the fielder at midwicket - scores are level now
tossed up delivery, probably the doosra. Taylor was clueless and the ball crashes into the pad
all over! low fulltoss on the stumps and Taylor clips it away to deep midwicket
